name: The Simulation (Yortoise the tortoise)
description:
A fast-paced, brutally-hard, arcade-style first person shooter, made with Godot and Blender.

Your guns have got a lot of kick which you can use to jump higher.

Controls:

WASD: Move

Space: Jump

Shift: Sprint

LMB: Shoot

RMB: Scope

Mouse: Look

R: Reload

V: switch to third person camera (not 100% working, also you don't have a body, just arms)
